metadata.title: CVE-2023-52640 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Fix oob in ntfs_listxattrThe length of name cannot exceed the space occupied by ea.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
